content:
EOF and SVD 假设我们原始数据距平为$X_{m\times n}$, 有m个空间点和n个时间点，数学意义上，即 $X$ 的数据被记录在一共 $m$ 个维度上，在第 $i$ 维度的第 $j$ 时刻，数据为$x_{i,j}$. 而EOF的本质就是将 $X$ 重新分配到新的维度上： $$ X_{m\times n}=EOF_{m\times m}\cdot PC_{m\times n}= \left[\begin{matrix} eof_1, eof_2,&hellip;,eof_m \end{matrix}\right]_{m\times m} \cdot \left[\begin{matrix} pc_1 \ pc_2 \ &hellip; \ pc_m \end{matrix}\right]_{m\times n} $$ where EOF is the eigenvector matrixs, which is an normal orthogonal matrix, i.e.: $EOF^T=EOF^{-1}$ ,and PC is the projection of X in the new coordinates EOF: $$ PC =EOF^{-1}\cdot X= EOF^T\cdot X $$
Eigenvalues method To calculate the eigenvmatrix $EOF$, first we should calculate the Covariance matrix: $$ C_{m\times m}=\frac{1}{n}X\cdot X^T $$ then the eigenvector matrix EOF or V satisfies: $$ V \cdot C =\Sigma \cdot C \tag{1} $$ where $\Sigma$ is the eigenvalues matrix: $$ \Sigma =\left[\begin{array}{cccc} \lambda_{1} &amp; 0 &amp; \dots &amp; 0 \
0 &amp; \lambda_{2} &amp; \dots &amp; 0 \
\dots &amp; \dots &amp; \dots &amp; \dots \
0 &amp; 0 &amp; \dots &amp; \lambda_{m} \end{array}\right] $$ To solve (1), move the right hand side of the equation to lhs, get: $$ (V-\Sigma)\cdot C = 0 \tag{2} $$ now the equation becomes an first order homogeneous equation. To get a nontrivial solution for (2), the determinant of $(V-\Sigma)$ should be equals 0: $$ \left| V-\Sigma\right |=0 $$ from which we can calculate the V and $\Sigma$
SVD method: $$ X_{m,n}=svd(X)=U_{m,m}\Sigma_{m,n}V_{n,n} $$
where $U_{m,m} = EOF_{m,m}$, $PC_{m,n}=\Sigma_{m,n}V_{n,n}$.
Relationship of difference eigenvectors (eof_i) To find out the relationship of difference $eof_i$, we can calculate: $$ \begin{align} EOF^T\cdot EOF &amp;=\left[\begin{matrix} eof_1\eof_2\&hellip;\eof_m \end{matrix}\right]{m,1} \cdot \left[\begin{matrix} eof_1, eof_2,&hellip;,eof_m \end{matrix}\right]{1\times m} \
&amp;= \left[\begin{matrix} eof_1\cdot eof_1, \space eof_1\cdot eof_2,&hellip;,eof_1\cdot eof_m\
eof_2\cdot eof_1, \space eof_2\cdot …
title: 2020-07-06-EOF

content: Some notes I take when I learn Marine Science data analysis methods.
title: Data Analysis

content:
1. Introduction Supposed we need one property data to study on problem, and we measure that property in the field, recorded as p(x), where x is the coordinates of that property, which can be spatial coordinates or temporal coordinates. In the realy world, we can’t make sure that those p are regularlly measured. However, many data analysis methods needs the data to be regularly recorded, or to be gridded. Therefore, we need to calculate the estimated p(x’) in the gridded location x’ based on the measured p(x), those steps call Interpolation.
2. Cases 2.1 3D SSH/Altimeter data interpolation. What we have: mesured level 3 track altimeter SSH data, recorded as {SSH(lon, lat, time)}. Those data are scatter data.
Steps   Weighting data $SSH(lon_i,lat_j, t_1) $to $SSH(lon_i, lat_j, t_0)$ $$ W_{k}=\frac{2-\frac{\Delta t^{2}}{T^{2}}}{2+\frac{\Delta t^{2}}{T^{2}}} $$ this equation is from Zhang et al.(2006), where $\Delta t = t_1-t_0$
  interpolating those data with the 2D interpolating methods at time $t_0$. For example, Kriging interpolation, optimal interpolation or barnes interpolation.
  References  Zhang, H., Bates, J. J., &amp; Reynolds, R. W. (2006). Assessment of composite global sampling: Sea surface wind speed. Geophysical Research Letters, 33, L17714. https://doi.org/10.1029/2006GL027086
title: Data Interpolation 数据插值

Ref: Lee et al 2020 Environ. Res. Lett. in press https://doi.org/10.1088/1748-9326/ab8527
1. What data did the author use in this paper?   Satellite observation: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) Optimum Interpolation (OI) SST data (OISST; Reynolds et al 2002),
1982~2018, $0.25^o\times0.25^o$, daily.
Variable : SST
  Model data: NASA Modern-Era Retrospective Analysis for Research and Application Version 2 (MERRA2; Gelaro et al 2017)
$0.5^o\times 0.625^o$, 72 levels from surface to 0.01 hPa
Variable: geopotential height fields.
  Global Precipitation Climatology Project (GPCP) data
Variable: Precipitation
  2. What methods did the author use?  EOF Linear Regression  3. what are their most important findings or conclusions (up to 3)? 4. what do you find most interesting about their research? 5. would you have done the research differently, to improve it, if it was you doing it? This study is just focus on Summer.
6. Results:   figure 1.
 figure 1a is the mean SST distribution map, and figure 1b is the threshold map. Generally, their spatial pattern are very similar to each other, with the threshold map is 1 to 2 degree higher than the mean SST map. However, there are still some smaller scale differences in the Japanese Sea and the Yellow Sea. fig.1c and d: Duration trend and SST trend seem to not correlated with each other in spatial. e: time series. exihibits a strong interannual variation as well as a positive trend.  Figure 1. Seasonal mean of (a) SST and (b) 90th percentile of daily SST using OISST data for 1982‒2011, and long-term trends of (c) seasonal mean and (d) total MHW duration days for 1982‒2018. (e) Time series of total MHW duration (solid line) with a least-square linear fit (dashed line). The dashed regions in (c) and (d) indicate the area where the trends of SST and MHWs are significant with confidence level.
  Figure 2.
Figure 2. Spatial patterns of the two primary modes of the EOF of East Asian MHW duration in the left

content: Marine Heatwaves
title: Paper Reading Notes

content:
科氏力 科氏力 2D 条件下科氏力 所谓的科氏力，是在非惯性系下使得研究对象仍然满足惯性系下牛顿第二定律而增加的一种虚拟力。
两个参考系下，由伽利略变换可得，在非惯性系下的位移为： $$ r&rsquo; = r+vt $$ 旋转坐标系下，$v = \omega \times r'$, 可得： $$ r&rsquo; = r+\omega \times rt $$ 同理，相对参考系下的速度为： $$ v&rsquo; = v + \omega \times r $$ 加速度： $$ a&rsquo; = a + 2\omega \times v + \omega \times \omega \times r $$ 第二项便是科氏力的由来。
3D 条件下的科氏力 静惯性震荡 Navi-Stokes Function为： $$ \frac{\partial \mathbf{u}}{\partial t} = - \mathbf{u}\nabla \mathbf{u} + P + F $$ 上式为欧拉观点下的加速度方程，即等式左边为 $\partial u/\partial t$。 所谓惯性，即物体保持本身运动状态的能力，依照牛顿第一定律，物体在不受外力的情况下能够保持自身运动状态（运动或者静止，静止是一种特殊状态下（速度为0）的运动）。而在地球无时无刻不在自转，我们身为一个跟着地球转的观察者，处于一个非惯性系下无时无刻都会收到科氏力的影响。为了使得牛顿第一定律成立，科氏力作为一个虚拟力必须加上去，才能满足物体在非惯性系下满足惯性坐标系下的牛顿第一定律。因此，在旋转坐标系下，科氏力并不是一种外力，而是类似重力的一种体力。
因此，所谓惯性震荡，即单单收到科氏力的作用下，水质点来回运动的一种状态。
而要使得物体仅仅收到科氏力作用，就必须满足以下几个条件：
 海面水平梯度为0，或者极小，可以忽略不计（压强梯度力） 只研究水平运动（重力） 无风，水体粘性低 无摩擦（粘性），深水区  这样我们才能得到一个方程： $$ \frac{d \mathbf{u}}{dt} = f\mathbf{k}\times \mathbf{u} $$ 解这个方程我们就可以得到所谓的惯性震荡。
而要满足上面四个条件的海域：
 海面水平梯度为0: 长时间大尺度条件下，水平梯度决定了地转流，因此这个条件决定了不能在主要流系的位置（西边界，东边界，赤道等） 只研究水平运动：没有限制海域 无风，水体粘性低。这个条件决定了不能在风带区，而满足这个条件的海域明显就是副热带海盆中心地带。 无摩擦，深水区。即不能在浅水区。  综上，比较合适的观察静惯性震荡的海域是所谓的“热带沙漠”区，即副热带幅聚区：风速低，深海，水质高，科氏力较强。
数值模拟部分 这个章节的数值模拟其实主要讨论了差值方法如何稳定这个这个问题。本质上一个模型用数值方法来模拟解析解，经过n步之后的数值解在网格无限精细的前提下如果能接近解析解，那么这个数值解就是收敛的。但是证明收敛很难， 根据Lax–Richtmyer equivalence theorem (Lax &amp; Richtmyer, 1956:
 A consistent ﬁnite-difference scheme for a linear partial differential equation for which the initial value problem is well posed is convergent if and only if it is stable.
 收敛的前提是数值解稳定，即数值解不回无限增大，所以问题就变成了寻找一个钟稳定的差值方法。
但是这个解决办法的前提是本身解析解就是稳定的，即解析解不会无限增大。这个在自然条件下经常能够满足，因为有摩擦力的存在。
对于差值方法，可以按照阶数分类：
  一阶差值：
 前差，显性欧拉方法，不收敛：The explicit Euler method ( forward scheme): $$ u^n = u^{n-1}+\Delta tQ^{n-1} $$     后差（backward）:The implicit Euler method (backward scheme): $$ u_{n+1} = u_n+\Delta tQ_{n+1} $$  这两个方法里面，前差是不稳定的，后差是稳定的。
 二阶差值
  The semi-implicit Euler scheme (trapezoidal scheme), 其实就是1/2的前差和后差之和： $$ \tilde{u}^{n+1}=\tilde{u}^{n}+\frac{\Delta …
title: 02 - Coriolis Force and Inertial Oscillation

content:
几大海洋方程 质量守恒方程 $$ \frac{\partial \rho}{\partial t}+\frac{\partial}{\partial x}(\rho u)+\frac{\partial}{\partial y}(\rho v)+\frac{\partial}{\partial z}(\rho w)=0 $$
栋梁守恒方程 $$ \begin{aligned} &amp;x: \rho\left(\frac{\mathrm{d} u}{\mathrm{d} t}+f_{*} w-f v\right)=-\frac{\partial p}{\partial x}+\frac{\partial \tau^{x x}}{\partial x}+\frac{\partial \tau^{x y}}{\partial y}+\frac{\partial \tau^{x z}}{\partial z}\
&amp;y: \quad \rho\left(\frac{\mathrm{d} v}{\mathrm{d} t}+f u\right)=-\frac{\partial p}{\partial y}+\frac{\partial \tau^{x y}}{\partial x}+\frac{\partial \tau^{y y}}{\partial y}+\frac{\partial \tau^{y z}}{\partial z}\
&amp;z: \rho\left(\frac{\mathrm{d} w}{\mathrm{d} t}-f_{*} u\right)=-\frac{\partial p}{\partial z}-\rho g+\frac{\partial \tau^{x z}}{\partial x}+\frac{\partial \tau^{y z}}{\partial y}+\frac{\partial \tau^{z z}}{\partial z} \end{aligned} $$
状态方程 $$ \rho=\rho_{0}\left[1-\alpha\left(T-T_{0}\right)+\beta\left(S-S_{0}\right)\right] $$
Energy Budget $$ \frac{\mathrm{d} e}{\mathrm{d} t}=Q-W $$
Boussinesq approximation 博西尼可近似就是假设所有位置的密度差异与其密度平均值的差异不大，因而在所有位置的密度都可以用一个密度常量表示，除了在锋面附近。因此，在海洋里面，密度可以表示为： $$ \rho=\rho_{0}+\rho^{\prime}(x, y, z, t) \quad \text { with } \quad\left|\rho^{\prime}\right| \ll \rho_{0} $$
质量守恒与体积守恒 有了这个假设，质量守恒方程就可以表示为： $$ \rho_{0}\left(\frac{\partial u}{\partial x}+\frac{\partial v}{\partial y}+\frac{\partial w}{\partial z}\right) +\rho^{\prime}\left(\frac{\partial u}{\partial x}+\frac{\partial v}{\partial y}+\frac{\partial w}{\partial z}\right) +\left(\frac{\partial \rho^{\prime}}{\partial t}+u \frac{\partial \rho^{\prime}}{\partial x}+v \frac{\partial \rho^{\prime}}{\partial y}+w \frac{\partial \rho^{\prime}}{\partial z}\right)=0 $$ 接下来就是做scalling analysis，第三项的变化正常情况下会比第一项和第二项小很多。所以如果省略第三项，那么第一项和第二项就可以合并，消去体积之后我们可以得到： $$ \frac{\partial u}{\partial x}+\frac{\partial v}{\partial y}+\frac{\partial w}{\partial z}=0 $$ 由此，质量守恒变成了体积守恒。
动量方程变化 基于牛顿流体假设（其实我不太理解海水一定非得是牛顿流体？），动量粘性系数为： $$ \nu=\mu / \rho_{0} $$ 动量方程可以改写为： $$ \begin{aligned} …
title: 03 - Equations of Fluid Motions

content: Zelun Wu

Zelun Wu Ph.D. student of Physical Oceanography, Xiamen University &amp; University of Delaware zelunwu@stu.xmu.edu.cn, zelunwu@udel.edu
Research Interests Climate Change, Marine Heatwaves
Educations Xiamen University, Bachelor of Science (2012 – 2016) Xiamen University, Master of Physical Oceanography (2016 – 2018) Dual Degree, Ph.D. student of Physical Oceanography, Xiamen University, University of Delaware (2019 – ) Publications  Jiamei Huang, Wei Zhuang, Xiao-Hai Yan, Zelun Wu, 2020, Impacts of the upper-ocean salinity variations on the decadal sea level change in the southeast Indian Ocean during the Argo era, https://doi.org/10.1007/s13131-020-1574-4

content:
由于我使用的是Mac，所以这里的教程针对macOS和Linux，Windows不适用（cmd我也不熟），应该也是类似，直接去官网下载Hugo的exe文件安装即可（应该，没试过）。
1. 下载Hugo到本地 homebrew 是mac上类似debian的 apt和centos/redhat 的 yum的软件管理平台，很多开源软件以及编译环境，apt/yum能完成的，homebrew多数情况下也能完成， 比如netcdf/gcc等。
首先安装打开homebrew, 已经装好的可以跳过，打开terminal输入：
/bin/bash -c &quot;$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install.sh)&quot; 安装完成后安装hugo:
brew install hugo 2. Hugo 创建本地博客 原理是这样：你在content文件夹里面写博客（markdown），Hugo根据自有的文件框架，自动生成一个public文件夹，文件夹里面是多数服务器能识别的html文件。如果需要部署到服务器或者githubpage，将public文件夹同步上就行。
先cd到你想要放本地博客的文件夹，用hugo创建博客文件夹并初始化：
hugo new site myblog myblog可以是任意你想要的名字。然后需要下载主题themes，上这里去挑：https://themes.gohugo.io，挑完进主题的github仓库里面，下载到 myblog/themes文件夹，或者用git克隆下来。比如我看上了一个很简约的主题：hugo-theme-techdoc，就是这个博客用的，那么我的命令是：
cd myblog cd themes git clone https://github.com/thingsym/hugo-theme-techdoc.git cd .. 完成后就可以看看你本地的博客了：
hugo server -t hugo-theme-techdoc 浏览器输入：http://localhost:1313
3. 写博客 创建主页：terminal输入
hugo new content/_index.md 或者直接进 content 文件夹创建 _index.md文件也行。用markdown输入你想要展示的主页内容即可。
创建 about： 同样，在content文件夹里面创建about.md
笔记归类： 在content里面创建文件夹，然后这个文件夹里面单独创建_index.md文件，用于描述该分类，文件头应有类似描述：
--- title: 教程 date: 2020-06-22T15:26:15Z draft: false weight: 11 --- 其中weight表示这个分类在目录的排序，1 就是排在第一个。
文件图片管理： hugo的图片文件都放在 mysite/static文件夹，markdown引用一个figure.png的文件，将这个文件拷贝进static文件夹，然后任意markdown文件引用的的时候直接
![figure](figure.png) 即可。但是这样有个问题，网页端可以显示，但是本地编辑器类似typora不能显示。解决方案是将要写的文件命名为文件夹，写入的markdown文件在文件夹里面命名成_index.md,然后图片放入同一个文件夹就可以按照当前文件夹里面的相对目录直接引用了。
这里我参考了文件管理方案，里面写的很详细，我就不再赘述。
4. 利用Mathjax加入Latex写公式 专业原因经常要写很多公式，当然也可以截图用图片引用，但是还是latex比较方便。
懒点的做法就是直接下载个支持latex的主题。但是支持latex又是你喜欢的主题有时候这两个条件并不能同时成立。也没关系，可以自己改下主题。
我的解决方案是参考了这里
首先在你喜欢的主题下载好之后，在主题文件夹里面的layouts/partials里面创建一个mathjax.html文件，比如我的目录就是：
myblog/themes/hugo-theme-techdoc/layouts/partials
文件里面写入：
&lt;script type=&quot;text/javascript&quot; async src=&quot;https://cdn.bootcss.com/mathjax/2.7.3/MathJax.js?config=TeX-AMS-MML_HTMLorMML&quot;&gt; MathJax.Hub.Config({ tex2jax: { inlineMath: [['$','$'], …
title: 1. Hugo搭建博客+引入mathjax+部署GitHub page

content:
MITgcm requires at least one complier: c language compiler. The most common complier in Unix based OS is gcc. Other dependencies are netcdf-c, ifort etc.
Install Dependencies in MacOS   Install homebrew. You can download the clang/gcc source code and compile it by yourself, which may give you more freedom to specify the install rootdir. However, one easier wat I suggest is to use homebrew to install such dependencies but not compile them by yourself.
Open your terminal, copy this line and execute it:
/bin/bash -c &quot;$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install.sh)&quot;   Install gcc. it is easy to install other dependencies if you already installed homebrew. Again, open your terminal:
brew install gcc gcc includes gfortran.
  Install netcdf. I don’t suggest you to compile the netcdf source code by yourself, because netcdf library requires other dependencies: zlib, hdf5 etc. Instead, we can use homebrew to install netcdf again, which will install other dependencis for netcdf automatically.
brew install netcdf   Install openmpi
To use mpirun, we should install openmpi
brew install open-mpi   Install Dependencies in Ubuntu, CentOS, and RedHat While you are looking for the wikipage for ROMs, you may find that they suggest you to install zlib, hdf5, netcdf-c, netcdf-fortran, gcc, gfortran/ifort by compiling the source code. However, from my own experience, it is not easy. Therefore, similarly, I suggest you to install such dependencies with apt/yum.
The name of netcdf library in Ubuntu and CentOS is deference, howevr, we still can use
sudo apt search libnetcdf to search for the right name of the package, then:
sudo apt install libnetcdfc-dev similarly, in CentOS &amp; RedHat, we can do:
sudo yum search netcdf
title: 01 - How to Install MITgcm dependencis

content:
一些觉得有用的教程。
